briefTitle: Long-Term Antibody Persistence at 1, 3 and 5 Years After a Fourth Dose of GSK Biologicals' Hib-MenCY-TT Vaccine Compared to ActHIB

eligibilityModule.eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Healthy male and female children who completed the previous four dose vaccination series study (NCT00129129). The age of the child at the 3 post-fourth dose timelines are as follows:

  * Year 1: 22 to 36 months of age.
  * Year 3: 44 to 60 months of age.
  * Year 5: 5 years post-dose 4 +/- 8 weeks
* Written informed consent obtained from the parent or guardian of the subject.
* Healthy subjects as established by medical history and clinical examination before entering into the study
* Having completed the fourth dose vaccination of study Hib-MenCY-TT-005/006

Exclusion Criteria:

Children should not have:

* received more than 4 doses of Hib or meningococcal serogroup C and Y vaccine
* had a history of H. influenzae type b, meningococcal serogroup C and Y diseases

outcomeMeasures.title: Number of Subjects With Anti- Polyribosylribitol Phosphate (Anti-PRP) Antibody Concentrations Greater Than or Equal to 0.15 Microgram Per Milliliter
outcomeMeasures.description: Results up to 5 years after the fourth dose are presented.

outcomeMeasures.title: Number of Subjects With Neisseria Meningitidis Serogroup C (MenC) Antibody Titers Greater Than or Equal to 1:8 as Measured by Serum Bactericidal Assay Using Human Complement (hSBA)
outcomeMeasures.description: Results up to 5 years after the fourth dose are presented.

outcomeMeasures.title: Number of Subjects With Neisseria Meningitidis Serogroup Y (MenY) Antibody Titers Greater Than or Equal to 1:8 as Measured by Serum Bactericidal Assay Using Human Complement (hSBA)
outcomeMeasures.description: Results up to 5 years after the fourth dose are presented.

outcomeMeasures.title: Anti-PRP Geometric Mean Concentrations (GMCs)
outcomeMeasures.description:
Concentration were measured as Geometric Mean Concentrations expressed as microgram per milliliter (Âµg/mL).

Results up to 5 years after the fourth dose are presented.

outcomeMeasures.title: Number of Subjects With Anti-PRP Antibody Concentrations Greater Than or Equal to 1.0 Microgram Per Milliliter
outcomeMeasures.description: Results up to 5 years after the fourth dose are presented.

outcomeMeasures.title: hSBA-MenC Geometric Mean Titers (GMTs)
outcomeMeasures.description:
Titers are given as Geometric Mean Titers as measured by human serum bactericidal assay (hSBA) and expressed as the reciprocal of the dilution resulting in 50% inhibition.

Results up to 5 years after the fourth dose are presented.

outcomeMeasures.title: Number of Subjects With hSBA-MenC Titers Greater Than or Equal to 1:4
outcomeMeasures.description: Results up to 5 years after the fourth dose are presented.

outcomeMeasures.title: hSBA-MenY Geometric Mean Titers (GMTs)
outcomeMeasures.description:
Titers are given as Geometric Mean Titers as measured by human serum bactericidal assay (hSBA) and expressed as the reciprocal of the dilution resulting in 50% inhibition.

Results up to 5 years after the fourth dose are presented.

outcomeMeasures.title: Number of Subjects With hSBA-MenY Titers Greater Than or Equal to 1:4
outcomeMeasures.description: Results up to 5 years after the fourth dose are presented.
